topics.body:
Oh wow; Microsoft is probably going to fuck up windows 10 super hard.

You know how windows 8 was shit cause they focused on tablets rather than actual laptops or desktops?  Yeah; they're focusing even more on tablets and phones.

They're offering it free, but after a year of using it you have to pay for it.
